key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks, including settlements for discriminatory practices and subprime mortgage-backed securities
Cybersecurity threats due to a major data breach and ongoing vulnerabilities
Economic sensitivity, particularly to downturns in the auto financing sector and interest rate fluctuations
Customer service inefficiencies, with a high number of unresolved complaints
Competitive pressures from traditional banks and fintech innovators
controversies: $80 million settlement with the CFPB and DOJ for discriminatory auto lending practices
$52 million settlement related to subprime mortgage-backed securities
Class-action lawsuits following a major data breach in April 2024
social_issues: Discriminatory auto lending practices affecting minority borrowers
Customer service complaints and inefficiencies in complaint resolution
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and ongoing oversight in consumer protection and fair lending
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities leading to data breaches
